result.eng: A spell in the army will do you good.
result.ga: Déanfaidh seal san arm maitheas duit
result.orig: Déanfaidh seal san arm maitheas duit
result.html: Déanfaidh seal san arm maitheas duitA spell in the army will do you good.
result.ponchtml: Déanfaiḋ seal san arm maiṫeas duitA spell in the army will do you good.

result.eng: Everything only lasts for a short time.
result.ga: Ní mhaireann aon ní ach seal
result.orig: Ní mhaireann aon ní ach seal
result.html: Ní mhaireann aon ní ach sealEverything only lasts for a short time.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṁaireann aon ní aċ sealEverything only lasts for a short time.

result.eng: He spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.
result.ga: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar Mheiriceá
result.orig: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar Mheiriceá
result.html: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar MheiriceáHe spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ sé seal i bPáras sular ṫug sé aġaiḋ ar ṀeiriceáHe spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.

result.eng: They were waiting for their turn.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag feitheamh lena seal
result.orig: Bhí siad ag feitheamh lena seal
result.html: Bhí siad ag feitheamh lena sealThey were waiting for their turn.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag feiṫeaṁ lena sealThey were waiting for their turn.
